disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Stone Skin.

description.value: Innate: Wukong gains 5 − 9 (based on level)  bonus armor and regenerates 0.5% of his maximum health per 5 seconds.

description2.value: These effects are increased by 50% for 5 seconds whenever Wukong or his clone damage an enemy champion or monster. Bonuses stack up to 10 times to a maximum of 30 − 54 (based on level) bonus armor and 3% maximum health regeneration.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Crushing Blow.

blurb.value: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.

description.value: Active: Wukong and his clone empower their staffs, causing their next basic attack within 5 seconds to become unstoppable, gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage and  reduce the target's armor for 3 seconds.

leveling.value:
Bonus Range:75 / 100 / 125 / 150 / 175
Bonus Physical Damage:20 / 45 / 70 / 95 / 120 (+ 50% bonus AD)
Armor Reduction:10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30% of target's armor

description2.value: Crushing Blow's  cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds whenever Wukong or his clone damages an enemy.

description3.value: Crushing Blow resets Wukong and his clone's basic attack timer.

description4.value: Other abilities can be used during the attack's animation.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Crushing Blow triggers on structures and wards but the armor reduction is not applied. Pressing S will cancel the animation and the attack will still land, but Wukong will not be able to move until it lands.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Warrior Trickster.

effect radius.value: clone's attack range

description.value: Active: Wukong dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, while entering invisibility for 1 second and leaving behind a decoy of himself for 3.25 seconds.

description2.value: The clone can basic attack autonomously, prioritizing the last enemy Wukong damaged. It can also gain Crushing Blow, Nimbus Strike's bonus attack speed, and Cyclone.

description3.value: The clone deals reduced outgoing damage.

description4.value: Wukong can cast any of his abilities during Warrior Trickster's dash.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Casting Warrior Trickster during an ability's effects will transfer them to the clone. Turret shots instantly kill the clone. The clone is immune to stasis. The clone is untargetable to allies, unless it is from an auto-targeted effect (i.e - Heal, Celestial Blessing).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Nimbus Strike.

blurb.value: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.

description.value: Active: Wukong dashes on a cloud to the target enemy's location and sends out untargetable clones to attack up to two additional enemies near the target's location, dealing magic damage to each enemy struck. The clones can block non-targeted attacks or abilities for 0.25 seconds after hitting their targets.

description2.value: Upon hitting his target, Wukong and his clone gain  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

description3.value: Wukong cannot cast Warrior Trickster nor Cyclone while dashing, but he may still buffer them. Crushing Blow can be used.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Nimbus Strike has an offset distance of 75 units from the target dashed to. The ability applies a stack of Electrocute / Phase Rush even if the target is untargetable. The created clones are considered champions for Turret Plating's gold sharing.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Cyclone.

blurb.value: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.

description.value: Active: Wukong and his clone spin their staffs around for up to 2 seconds, becoming ghosted and gaining  20% bonus movement speed. The spin deals physical damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds. Enemies affected by an active Cyclone for the first time are knocked up for 0.6 seconds. Cyclone can be canceled by casting another ability or recasting after 0.5 seconds. Cyclone can be reactivated within 8 seconds of the first cast after 1 second.

leveling.value: Damage Per Tick:»1 / 1.25 / 1.5 / 1.75 / 2% of target's maximum health (+ 27.5% AD) «Total Damage:16 / 20 / 24 / 28 / 32% of target's maximum health (+ 440% AD)

description2.value: Recast: Wukong and his clone spin their staffs a second time, mimicking the first cast's effects. If recast while spinning, Wukong stops spinning early instead; Wukong can still spin a second time after stopping his first spin early, and can end his second spin early as well.

description3.value: The clone's Cyclone will not knock up enemies who were already hit by Wukong's active Cyclone.

description4.value: Nimbus Strike's bonus attack speed duration is continuously refreshed while spinning.

description5.value: Cyclone's damage is capped at 200 / 400 / 600 (based on level) per second against monsters.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Cyclone is special cased to grant stacks of Conqueror for each tick of damage. Casting Crushing Blow will cancel Cyclone for both Wukong and his clone. Warrior Trickster and Nimbus Strike will only interrupt Wukong's Cyclone. Cyclone's remaining duration always stays the same even after the clone replicated the ability. During Cyclone, Wukong and his clone's  attack ranges are reduced by 125. Spell shield will block one instance of damage. Blocking the knock up will still grant immunity to it from either of Cyclone's casts. Attacking Disabled Abilities Other abilities are disabled for the first 0.3 seconds, casting them afterwards interrupts. Movement Allowed Items Usable All items are usable Disabled N/A Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Teleport Hexflash Disabled Recall Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death
